episodes.title: Episode 5: BethCast - I Was In a CULT! Being Brainwashed and Spiritual Pyschosis | Story Time
episodes.description:
What happens when spirituality crosses the line into control, manipulation, and brainwashing?

In this story time, I share the day I realized I was in a cult - how subtle spiritual teachings slowly turned into psychological control, how I was gaslit into believing my fear was “growth,” and how it all led to spiritual psychosis.

This isn’t an anti-spirituality video. It’s an honest conversation about spiritual abuse, high-control groups, and how easy it is to lose yourself when critical thinking is replaced with blind faith.

If you’ve ever:
• Felt scared to question a spiritual leader
• Experienced spiritual psychosis or dissociation
• Wondered if you were being spiritually manipulated

Share your experience in the comments, your story could help someone else feel less alone.

Like, comment, and subscribe if you want more real conversations about healing and living a Christ centered life.

Suggested video to watch 
https://youtu.be/9hJ2xz7wyR0?si=zT85DLGYuV86hZwj
